name: Black Swan
description: Nina, a ballerina, gets the chance to play the White Swan, Princess Odette. But she finds herself slipping into madness when Thomas, the artistic director, decides that Lily might fit the role better.

name: The Favourite
description: In early 18th-century England, the status quo at the court is upset when a new servant arrives and endears herself to a frail Queen Anne.

name: Call Me by Your Name
description: Elio, a teenager, develops feelings for Oliver, his father's temporary assistant. Although their relationship is temporary, Elio realises his sexual orientation and tries to come to terms with it.

name: A Quiet Place
description: A family struggles for survival in a world where most humans have been killed by blind but noise-sensitive creatures. They are forced to communicate in sign language to keep the creatures at bay.

name: Norbit
description: A meek Norbit rediscovers his love for a childhood sweetheart, but his mean wife is determined not to let him go till she wrests control of a restaurant from his foster father.
